name: One Earth Foundation
briefDescription: One Earth Foundation is a registered trust that works towards the conservation and preservation of our country's natural wealth and cultural heritage.  We are geographically focused in the Nilgiris (Blue Mountains) in Tamil Nadu.  The area is home to 6 primitive tribes, has among the highest forest cover in the country, is the first Biosphere Reserve in India and hence is culturally and ecologically a very sensitive area.Our core sectors are education, environment and preservation of traditional tribal knowledge systems.  In the social arena we work with marginalized communities and people from remote hill area villages and provide support in areas like education and health.  Over the past year we have directly impacted over 2000  persons
